resources.string: What is the definition of physics?
It is the natural science that studies the fundamental components and interactions of the universe, energy, matter and space-time.
Science that studies the structure, composition, and properties of the matter. Also seek the chemical reactions that are present in the matter and the relation with the energy.
It’s the formal Science, that use logic to study properties and relations between numbers, geometric shapes…
